TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed ClassInterfaceType extends System.Enum

summary.span: 識別為類別所產生的類別介面類型。

span.span: Identifies the type of class interface that is generated for a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個列舉型別用於搭配屬性。This enumeration is used in conjunction with the attribute. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何套用型別，設定。This example shows how to apply the to a type, setting the . 這種方式定義的類別可從 unmanaged com。Classes defined this way can be used from unmanaged COM. [!code-cpp[ClassInterfaceType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ClassInterfaceType/cpp/ClassInterfaceType.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClassInterfaceType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ClassInterfaceType/CS/ClassInterfaceType.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClassInterfaceType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ClassInterfaceType/VB/ClassInterfaceType.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ClassInterfaceType AutoDispatch = int32(1)

summary.span: 指示類別對 COM 用戶端只支援晚期繫結 (Late Binding)。

span.span: Indicates that the class only supports late binding for COM clients.

summary.span: 類別的 應要求會自動地公開至 COM 用戶端。

span.span: A for the class is automatically exposed to COM clients on request.

summary.span: [Tlbexp.exe (型別程式庫匯出工具)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md) 產生的型別程式庫不包含 類型資訊，以免用戶端快取介面的 DISPID。

span.span: The type library produced by [Tlbexp.exe (Type Library Exporter)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md) does not contain type information for the in order to prevent clients from caching the DISPIDs of the interface.

summary.span: 不會出現 中所描述的版本控制問題，因為用戶端只能晚期繫結到介面。

span.span: The does not exhibit the versioning problems described in because clients can only late-bind to the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是預設設定。This is the default setting for .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ClassInterfaceType AutoDual = int32(2)

summary.span: 指示雙重類別介面自動地產生給類別並公開至 COM。

span.span: Indicates that a dual class interface is automatically generated for the class and exposed to COM.

summary.span: 型別資訊產生給類別介面並發行至型別程式庫。

span.span: Type information is produced for the class interface and published in the type library.

summary.span: 由於 所描述的版本控制限制，我們非常不鼓勵使用 。

span.span: Using is strongly discouraged because of the versioning limitations described in .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ClassInterfaceType None = int32(0)

summary.span: 指示沒有類別介面產生給類別。

span.span: Indicates that no class interface is generated for the class.

summary.span: 如果沒有明確實作介面，類別只能透過 介面提供晚期繫結存取。

span.span: If no interfaces are implemented explicitly, the class can only provide late-bound access through the interface.

summary.span: 這是 的建議預設值。

span.span: This is the recommended setting for .

summary.span: 使用 是唯一透過類別明確實作的介面公開功能的方法。

span.span: Using is the only way to expose functionality through interfaces implemented explicitly by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Tlbexp.exe （類型程式庫匯出工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md)會公開為 coclass 的預設介面類別所實作的第一個公用、 COM 可見介面。[Tlbexp.exe (Type Library Exporter)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md) exposes the first public, COM-visible interface implemented by the class as the default interface of the coclass. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，您可以指定使用預設的介面公開至 COM屬性。Beginning with the .NET Framework version 2.0, you can specify the default interface exposed to COM by using the attribute. 如果類別沒有實作介面，基底類別所實作的第一個公用、 COM 可見介面會變成 （開頭為最近衍生的基底類別和回溯） 的預設介面。If the class implements no interfaces, the first public, COM-visible interface implemented by a base class becomes the default interface (starting with the most recently derived base class and working backward). Tlbexp.exe 會公開`_Object`如果類別或其基底類別都不會實作介面的預設介面。Tlbexp.exe exposes `_Object` as the default interface if neither the class nor its base classes implement interfaces.
